inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4624, 4625) and AccountType == 'User'
| extend EventName = iff(EventID == 4624, 'Success' , 'Fail') 
| summarize NumLogons = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now()), EventName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let top5 = SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625 and AccountType == 'User'
| extend Account_Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| summarize Attempts = count() by Account_Name
| where Account_Name != ''
| top 5 by Attempts 
| summarize makelist(Account_Name);
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625 and AccountType == 'User'
| extend Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| extend Account_Name = iff(Name in (top5), Name, 'Other')
| where Account_Name != ''
| summarize Attempts = count() by Account_Name

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4625, 4624)
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d)
| summarize count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| extend Week = iff(TimeGenerated>=ago(7d), 'This Week', 'Last Week'), TimeGenerated = iff(TimeGenerated>=ago(7d), TimeGenerated, TimeGenerated + 7d)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where AccountType == 'User'
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| summarize Unique_Accounts = dcount(Account), Attempts = count(), Succeeded=countif(EventID == 4624), Failed=countif(EventID == 4625)  by IpAddress
| where Failed > 0
| order by Succeeded>0, todouble(Succeeded)/Attempts asc, Attempts desc
| project IP = IpAddress, Succeeded, Attempts, Unique_Accounts
| take 10

content.PartTitle: Most suspicious failed logons, by IP address

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4625, 4624) and AccountType == 'User'
| extend AccountName = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| summarize Attempts = count(), Failed = countif(EventID == 4625), Succeeded = countif(EventID == 4624) by AccountName
| where AccountName != ''
| top 10 by Attempts
| project Account_Name = AccountName, Attempts, Failed, Succeeded

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType == 'User' 
| summarize Amount = count() by  LogonTypeName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where AccountType == 'User' and EventID == 4625
| extend Reason = case(
 SubStatus == '0xc000005e', 'No logon servers available to service the logon request',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000062', 'Account name is not properly formatted',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000064', 'Account name does not exist',
 SubStatus == '0xc000006a', 'Incorrect password',
 SubStatus == '0xc000006d', 'Bad user name or password',
 SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon blocked by account restriction',
 SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon outside of restricted logon hours',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000070', 'User logon blocked by workstation restriction',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000071', 'Password has expired',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000072', 'Account is disabled',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000133', 'Clocks between DC and other computer too far out of sync',
 SubStatus == '0xc000015b', 'The user has not been granted the requested logon right at this machine',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000193', 'Account has expirated',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000224', 'User is required to change password at next logon',
 SubStatus == '0xc0000234', 'Account is currently locked out', 
 strcat('Unknown reason substatus: ', SubStatus))
| summarize count() by Reason

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4724 
| summarize Resets = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Users Account Management over time
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4720, 4722, 4725, 4726, 4240, 4767)
| extend Operation = case( 
 EventID == 4720, 'User Created',
  EventID == 4722, 'User Enabled',
  EventID == 4725, 'User Disabled',
  EventID == 4726, 'User Deleted',
  EventID == 4740, 'User Locked Out',
  EventID == 4767, 'User Unlocked', 
 'Unknown')
| summarize Amount = count() by Operation

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4720, 4722, 4725, 4726, 4240, 4767)
| order by TimeGenerated
| extend EventType = case(
 EventID == 4720, 'User account created',
 EventID == 4722, 'User account enabled',
 EventID == 4725, 'User account disabled',
 EventID == 4726, 'User account deleted',
 EventID == 4767, 'User account unlocked',
 EventID == 4740, 'User account locked out',
 strcat('Unkown Event ID', EventID))
| project Time_Generated = TimeGenerated, Event_Type = EventType, Computer, Account
| limit 10

content.PartSubTitle: Last 10 - Created, Enabled, Disabled, Deleted, Locked Out, Unlocked

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4720, 4722, 4725, 4726, 4240, 4767)
| extend EventType = case(
 EventID == 4720, 'User account created',
 EventID == 4722, 'User account enabled',
 EventID == 4725, 'User account disabled',
 EventID == 4726, 'User account deleted',
 EventID == 4767, 'User account unlocked',
 EventID == 4740, 'User account locked out',
 strcat('Unkown Event ID', EventID))
| project EventType, Computer
| evaluate pivot(EventType, count(EventType))

content.PartSubTitle: Created, Enabled, Disabled, Deleted, Locked Out, Unlocked

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d)
| summarize Current_Week = countif(TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)), Previous_Week = countif(TimeGenerated < ago(7d)) by Computer
| extend Per = iff(Current_Week > Previous_Week, toreal(Current_Week) / Previous_Week, toreal(Previous_Week) / Current_Week)
| extend sign = iff(Current_Week > Previous_Week, '+', '-')
| extend Percentage = iff(Current_Week != 0 and Previous_Week != 0 and Previous_Week != Current_Week, strcat(sign, extract(@'(\d*(\.\d{1,2}|$))', 1, tostring((Per -1 )*100)), '%'), 'No Percentage - 0')
| project Computer, Previous_Week, Current_Week, Percentage

content.PartTitle: Number of successful logons per machine

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where AccountType == 'Machine' and EventID == 4624
| summarize AccountsNum = dcount(Account) by Computer
| sort by AccountsNum 
| take 50
| project Computer, Accounts = AccountsNum

content.PartTitle: Number of accounts successfully logged on

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType == 'Machine'
| summarize Amount = count() by  LogonTypeName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625
| extend Reason = case(
SubStatus == '0xc0000064', 'User name does not exist', 
SubStatus == '0xc000005e', 'No logon servers available to service the logon request', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000062', 'Account name is not properly formatted', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000064', 'Account name does not exist', 
SubStatus == '0xc000006a', 'Incorrect password', 
SubStatus == '0xc000006d', 'Bad user name or password', 
SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon blocked by account restriction', 
SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon outside of restricted logon hours', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000070', 'User logon blocked by workstation restriction', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000071', 'Password has expired', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000072', 'Account is disabled', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000133', 'Clocks between DC and other computer too far out of sync', 
SubStatus == '0xc000015b', 'The user has not been granted the requested logon right at this machine', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000193', 'Account has expirated', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000224', 'User is required to change password at next logon', 
SubStatus == '0xc0000234', 'Account is currently locked out',                         strcat('Unknown reason substatus: ', SubStatus))
| summarize count() by Reason, Computer
| evaluate pivot(Reason, sum(count_))

content.PartTitle: Number of failed logons, by reasons per machine

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityAlert
| mvexpand Entity = parse_json(Entities)
| where Entity.Type =~ 'account'
| project TimeGenerated, AlertName = DisplayName, Entity.Name, AlertSeverity 
| summarize RelatedAccounts = makeset(Entity_Name) by tostring(TimeGenerated), AlertName, AlertSeverity 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
